section.name: Fna !
section.p: Fna is a new open source project initiated by Adobe Consulting.

Fna is a set of samples, mavenized flex open source contributions (cf. flex-contrib-spring and event-source, a FlexUnit extension for testing cairngorm event dispatching) and maven archetypes that uses open source tools/frameworks built on the Java and Flex platform to help you develop RIA applications quickly and efficiently..

section.name: Fna ?
section.p: Fna? Why ? What is that name?

section.name: News
section.p:
Note that
blazeds-autowired-spring-hibernate-archetype will be presented
at MAX at the "Flex For Java Architects" Lab
